about_the_game:
Chaos Storm: Strategy Edition is a magic style tower defense strategy game. You will be the leader of a specific camp, strengthen your power through constant battle, defend your strongholds, and constantly expand your territory, eventually becoming the ruler of the whole world.

Controlling the battle in real time, you can control the guards to shoot the attacking enemies remotely, control the hero to fight in close combat, manage a fearsome ground and air attack, or cast powerful spells to defeat an onslaught of enemies trying to capture your flag and destroy your castle, At last, win the battle!
